content: स्थाणु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्था-नु पृषो° णत्वम्] Firm, fixed, steady, stable, immoveable, motionless. --णुः {@--1@} An epithet of Śiva; स स्थाणुः स्थिरभक्तियोगसुलभो निःश्रेयसायास्तु वः <ls>V. 1. 1.</ls> {@--2@} A stake, post, pillar; किं स्थाणुरयमुत पुरुषः; <ls>Pt. 1. 49.</ls> {@--3@} A peg, pin. {@--4@} The gnomon of a dial. {@--5@} A spear, dart. {@--6@} A nest of white ants. {@--7@} The drug or perfume called {%Jīvaka%}. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>n.</ab>%} A branchless trunk or stem, any bare stalk or stem, pollard;
